author: Cailley Chella, Anne Torpey
title: Yes, Your Pet Can Catch Coronavirus — but Don't Freak Out
description: “Realistically, pets aren't the best medium to transfer the virus. Their fur is coarse. So the droplets don't stay on there.”
content:
WEST HOLLYWOOD, California Dr. J.D. Caslyn is seeing patients a little differently now: without their owners. 
The California veterinarian is implementing social distancing in his practice by having pet owners wait in their cars and sending out a technician … [+1476 chars]
